column6: From those halcyon days gone by when the Champions were L.A.'s premier super-team comes this amazing assemblage featuring: Ghost Rider, The Black Widow, Angel, Remy LeBeau and the demi-god Hercules! It's The Champios vs. M.O.D.O.K.!
column7: | Black Widow | Champions | Gambit | Ghost Rider (Johnny Blaze) | Hercules | Iceman
